subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Athletics and Sports
organizations: U.S. Army All-American Bowl Selection Committee
lead_paragraph: Roger Barta, who built a high school football powerhouse in tiny Smith Center, Kan., was named national coach of the year by the U.S. Army All-American Bowl Selection Committee.
snippet: Roger Barta, who built a high school football powerhouse in tiny Smith Center, Kan., was named national coach of the year by the U.S. Army All-American Bowl Selection Committee.
